00179      **************************************************************************/
00180     
00181     inline DateTime::DateTime() : QDateTime()
00182     {}
00183     
00184     inline DateTime::DateTime(const QDateTime &rOther) : QDateTime(rOther)
00185     {}
00186     
00187     inline DateTime::DateTime(const QDate &rDate, 
00188                               const QTime &rTime, 
00189                               Qt::TimeSpec timeSpec) :
00190         QDateTime(rDate, rTime, timeSpec)
00191     {}
00192     
00193     inline DateTime &DateTime::operator=(const DateTime &rOther)
00194     {   QDateTime::operator=(rOther); return *this; }
00195     
00196     inline qint64 DateTime::toMilliSeconds() const
00197     {   return (qint64)1000 * toTime_t() + time().msec();   }
00198     
00199     inline DateTime DateTime::currentDateTime()
00200     {   return DateTime(QDateTime::currentDateTime());    }
00201     
00202     inline DateTime DateTime::fromMilliSeconds(qint64 milliSeconds)
00203     {   return DateTime(QDateTime::fromTime_t(milliSeconds / 1000).addMSecs(milliSeconds % 1000));    }
00204
